about_the_game: In this exciting game, we've decided to blend the genres of 'Rogue-like' and 'Auto chess' to create something unique and exhilarating! Now you can craft your own battle strategies by combining abilities from four different classes. Enjoy dynamic and adrenaline-fueled gameplay where every action counts. The talent system allows you to customize characters to your liking, while the hardcore action ensures every skirmish is full of unpredictable twists! Join the battle and immerse yourself in the unique world of our game, where your skill and strategic thinking will be put to the test like never before!
